782490.name: People Versus Everything
782490.description:
It's a bird! It's a plan! It's a garbage can?

Face your friends in this ridiculous cat-and-mouse free-to-play shooter.

Props
Try to blend in with the environment by turning into an object in the level. Taunt your opponents to gain score, blow yourself up to enact revenge, and flash them to run away in a pinch!

Hunters
Search the map for other players disguised as props. Use your killer instincts to sniff them out, and if that fails... you can always launch a train.

Features
  • Satisfying gunplay
  • Private/Public lobbies
  • Character customization
  • Over 15 Guns/Abilities
  • Runs on most computers!
782490.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
